abstract: Scrapblog, an online scrapbooking site, has nabbed in a $2.5 million funding round led by Walt Disney’s Steamboat Ventures, PaidContent reported.
snippet: Scrapblog, an online scrapbooking site, has nabbed in a $2.5 million funding round led by Walt Disney’s Steamboat Ventures, PaidContent reported.
lead_paragraph: Scrapblog, an online scrapbooking site, has received another $2.5 million in financing.

abstract: A consortium led by Walt Disney is in advanced talks to buy into China’s largest digital media and advertising company operating inside buses, a deal that could offer the U.S. entertainment giant a new platform to promote Mickey Mouse in China.
snippet: A consortium led by Walt Disney is in advanced talks to buy into China’s largest digital media and advertising company operating inside buses, a deal that could offer the U.S. entertainment giant a new platform to promote Mickey Mouse in China.
lead_paragraph: A consortium led by Walt Disney is in advanced talks to buy into China’s largest digital media and advertising company operating inside buses, a deal that could offer the American entertainment giant a new platform to promote Mickey Mouse in China, three sources told Reuters.

headline.main: Disney Eying Bus Advertiser Stake in China

abstract: Wesleyan University has accused Thomas Kannam, hired in 1998 to oversee the school’s endowment, of spending most of his time on outside business ventures while university assets shrunk with the financial crisis.
snippet: Wesleyan University has accused Thomas Kannam, hired in 1998 to oversee the school’s endowment, of spending most of his time on outside business ventures while university assets shrunk with the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: As the economy eroded, college endowments around the country, money managers in academia worked tirelessly to contain the damage. Everywhere, that is, but at Wesleyan University, at least according to a lawsuit that the university has brought against its former chief investment officer.

headline.main: Ex-Financial Adviser Is Sued by Wesleyan

abstract: Lionsgate, the independent movie studio tipped as a potential bidder for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, intends to table an “aggressive” offer for Miramax, which was recently put on the block by the Walt Disney Company, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Lionsgate, the independent movie studio tipped as a potential bidder for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, intends to table an “aggressive” offer for Miramax, which was recently put on the block by the Walt Disney Company, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Lionsgate, the independent movie studio tipped as a potential bidder for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, intends to make an “aggressive” offer for Miramax, which was recently put up for sale by the Walt Disney Company, The New York Post reported, citing people inside or close to Lionsgate.
